Articles.Content:
Someone told me to make cookies. I made them.

What am I doing with my life...

Anyway, I made a mixer and bowl too. The mixer doesn't spin or anything, it just looks good.

I ran out of chocolate chips, so seismometers had to be used as a substitue. Don't worry, all the big fast food chains already use worse stuff than scientific instruments! For baking, I added an aerospace grade "Fast Cook Turbo Oven" mounted above the pan. No, it's not a rocket engine, it's only derived from one! There's also a spatula next to the pan, and some hand grips so you don't burn yourself when you decide to be an idiot and move the pan.

I should probably be doing something more productive with my Sunday afternoon, but instead I'm here, building freakin' cookies in KSP. Someone help me, I'm a danger to myself...

I'm not going to post a DL unless someone asks for it, because I can find no reason for anyone to want to download this other than to spite me for not thinking anyone would download this.

EDIT: Someone asked for a download: http://kerbalx.com/pTrevTrevs/Kerbal-Cookie-Program

Watch this thread get like a hundred pages worth of replies.

Edited July 28, 2015 by pTrevTrevs

This is amazing. I'm impressed with the creativity but, heck, it's also just very well done!

What am I doing with my life...

Being a genius.
I want a download....I have no life either

I want a download....I have no life either

Hmm, later than I thought. I expected the first person to comment to ask for it. Okay, I'll post one as soon as I can tear myself away from Empire: Total War.

EDIT: Sorry, man, I can't upload a DL, KerbalX isn't playing nice right now. I'll try again tomorrow, but it won't be until at least 6:30pm, (US Central Time Zone) because I have lots of irl stuff to do. (The gods of marching band demand a sacrifice)

Edited July 26, 2015 by pTrevTrevs

Okay, download up in the OP for that crazy person who asked for it... I can't believe how much rep I've gotten for this. maybe I'll make more stupid stuff in the future...

Kerbal Cake Program confirmed...

Please do.

Someone once told me to build a rocket powered Mini Cooper based on that I built a Reliant Robin once, but I never got around to finishing it.
You should definitely take it to the mun and make mun cookies!
